pkgmetadata.longdescription: Rt Visualization in D3 // Create interactive visualisations of Rt estimates using 'D3.js' (Gibbs et al. (2020) doi:10.5281/zenodo.4011842). Developed primarily targeting Rt estimates generated by the 'EpiNow2' package, 'RtD3' aims to make simple, beautiful visualisations that help researchers explore their results and share them with others.
